thread.title: Javi RIPS Kailyn For ‘Sleeping With All These Dudes’ Amid Pregnancy Scandal
thread.title_full: Javi RIPS Kailyn For ‘Sleeping With All These Dudes’ Amid Pregnancy Scandal

author: Teresa Roca
title: Javi RIPS Kailyn For ‘Sleeping With All These Dudes’ Amid Pregnancy Scandal

organizations.name: kailyn lowry & javi marroquin filming ‘marriage boot camp

text:
Kailyn Lowry admitted to cheating on Javi Marroquin while he was deployed only months before she announced her pregnancy. In a Teen Mom 2 sneak peek, Lowry’s ex-husband blasts her for sleeping with other men and defends breaking into her home!
In the clip, Marroquin, 24, went to Lowry’s home to apologize for fighting after he snuck into her home through the basement.
“You have to understand how crazy you’ve made me for six months,” Marroquin told his ex-wife . “You expect me to come home and everything is supposed to be cherries and flowers.”
PHOTOS: He Has a Type! Javi Marroquin Caught On Camera Flirting With Kailyn Lowry Lookalike 
When Lowry said how she doesn’t care if he’s still listed on the house, he responded, “If I want to come here tomorrow morning and randomly break a window to get in here I can!”
But Marroquin didn’t stop there, as he said he didn’t know she was “sleeping with all these dudes” during his deployment.
Lowry fired back, “I’m not sleeping with all these dudes. Don’t sit here and try to make me sound like some ho while you were gone. I’m sorry that we weren’t going to work it out. Yeah I slept with someone else !”
PHOTOS: 13 Reasons Kailyn Lowry & Javi Marroquin Ended Their Rocky Marriage 
Lowry, 24, finally admitted to the cheating allegations, as she has denied his accusations in the past.
She is currently expecting her third child with her third baby daddy. Although fans suspect the father is a man named Chris after she said his name in an Instagram live video, she has yet to confirm his identity .
As Radar readers know, Lowry filed for a protection from abuse order against Marroquin only months later .
PHOTOS: Divorce Off? ‘Teen Mom’s Kailyn Lowry & Javi Marroquin Filming ‘Marriage Boot Camp’ 
“She said it’s because I harassed her via text about all this divorce and guy stuff,” Marroquin told Radar. “I signed a consent PFA, which means there’s no evidence of abuse. I just can’t contact her unless it’s in regards to Lincoln for a year. ”
Are you surprised Lowry slept with another man while Marroquin was deployed? Tell us in the comments!
